gurmukhi: SihnSwih ^UbI idho rhnmUM ] ik byZUMno bycUMno cUM bynmUM ]3]
transliteration: Shaihanshaahe Khnbidiho Rahnmoond|| Ki Beghoonno Bechoonno Choon Benamoond||3||
translation: He is the Sovereign, treasure-house of qualities and Guide; He is unparalleled and is without Form and Colour.3.

gurmukhi: n swzo n bwzo n &Ojo n &rS ] ^udwvMd b^iSMdih AYiS ArS ]4]
transliteration: Na Saazp Na Baazo Na Gadddo Na Farsh|| Khudaavand Bakhshindah(i) Aishe Arsh||4||
translation: Through His Generosity, He provides Heavenly Enjoyments to one without any wealth, falcon, army property and authority.4.

gurmukhi: jhwN pwk zbrsq zwihr zhUr ] auzwmI idho hm cu hwizr hzUr ]5]
transliteration: Jahaan Paak Zabarast Zaahoor|| Uzaamidiho Ham Chu Haazir Hazoor||5||
translation: He is the Transcendent as well as Immanent; He is Omnipresent and bestows honours.5.

gurmukhi: Aqw b^So pwk prvridgwr ] rhIm Asq rozI idhy hr idXwr ]6]
transliteration: Ataa Bakhsho Paak Parvardigadr|| Raheem Ast Rozidihe Har Diyaar||6||
translation: He is Holy, Generous and Preserver; He is Merciful and Provider of victuals.6.

gurmukhi: ik swihb idXwr Asqo Awzm AzIm ] ik husnul jmwl Asqo rwzk rhIm ]7]
transliteration: Ki Saahib Diyaar Asto Aazam Azim|| Ki Housnul Jamaal Asto Raazak Raheem||7||
translation: The Lord is Generous, the Highest of the High; He, the preserver, is Most Beautiful.7.

gurmukhi: ik swihb SaUr Asq Awijz invwz ] ZrIbul pRsqo ZnImul gudwz ]8]
transliteration: Ki Saahib Shaoor Ast Aajiz Nivaaz|| Gdareebhul Presto Ghaneemul Gudaaz||8||
translation: The Lord is Omniscient, the Protector of the lowly; He, the Friend of the poor, is the Destroyer of the enemies.8.

gurmukhi: SrIAq pRsqo &zIlq m-Awb ] hkIkq Snwso nbIaul ikqwb ]9]
transliteration: Sdareeat Presto Fazeelat Ma-aab|| Hakeekat Shanaaso Naheeul Kitaab||9||
translation: He is the Source of all virtues, keeper of Dharma; He knows everything and is the Source of all Scriptures.9.

gurmukhi: ik dwinS ipXUh Asq swihb SaUr ] hkIkq Snws Asqo zwhr zhUr ]10]
transliteration: Kidaanish Piyooh Ast Saahib Shaoor|| Hakeekat Shanaas Asto Zaahar Zahoor||10||
translation: He is the Perfect Being and Treasure of Wisdom; He, the All-Pervading Lord, is Omniscient.10.

gurmukhi: SnwisMdh-ey ielim Awlm ^dwie ] kuSwieMdh-ey kwir Awlm kuSwie ]11]
transliteration: Shanaasindah-e Ilam(i) Aalam Khudaae|| Koushaaindah-e Daar(i) Aalam Koushaae||11||
translation: The Lord of the Universe, Knows all the sciences and breaks the knots of all complications.11.

gurmukhi: guzwirMdh-ey kwir Awlm kbIr ] SnwisMdh-ey ielim Awlm AmIr ]12]
transliteration: Guzaarindah-e Daar(i) Aalam Kabeer|| Shanaasindah-e Ilam(i) Aalam Ameer||12||
translation: He, the Supreme and Most High, Supervises the whole world; He, the Sovereign of the Universe, is the Source of all Learning.12.

gurmukhi: mrw eyqbwry brIN ksm nysq ] ik eyzd gvwh Asqo XzdwN Xkysq ]13]
transliteration: Maraa Etbhare Dareen Kasam Nesat|| Kiezad Gadaah Asto Yazdaan Yakesat||13||
translation: I have faith in your oaths; the Lord Himself is the Witness.13.

gurmukhi: n kqrh mrw eyqbwry brosq ] ik b^SIau dIvwN hmh ikzbgosq ]14]
transliteration: Na Katrah Maraa Etbhare Badosat|| Kibakhsheeo Deevaan Hamah Kizab-gost||14||
translation: I have not an iota of faith in such a person, whose officers have relinquished the path of Turth.14.
